main event: A civilian observed a round, red object with a small trail in the sky over Cayucos, California on September 2, 1957.
interesting points: The object was seen for approximately half an hour,The observer reported the object made no sound,The object was identified as potentially being Venus, which is unusual for that time of year,The object's flight path was noted as moving north from the direction of Los Angeles,The observer utilized binoculars to enhance visibility of the object.
sighted object: round red object with a small trail
witness description: Civilian, Mr. **********, Cayucos, California. Unknown reliability.
